nodes.text: Ronto Morning Wrap was a dish including eggs, sausage, and cheese wrapped in a type of flatbread called a ronto wrapper. In 34 ABY, it was available at Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu, where Ronto Roasters served it as a breakfast-time alternative to the Ronto Wrap. It was suitable for consumption by humans.

This dish is found during breakfast in the real-world Ronto Roasters at Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. The menu's description reads, "Scrambled Eggs, grilled pork sausage, shredded cheddar, peppercorn sauce, wrapped in pita."
